results.title: Hydatids: a cycle to break
results.brief_description: Illustrates the life cycle of the cyst showing how it is transmitted to humans via dogs who have eaten infected sheep offal. Stresses that efficient disposal of infected sheep offal by farmers can go a long way to preventing the infection of dogs with cysts and that humans should exercise good hygiene habits when handling dogs.

results.title: Hush little baby
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Picture Book Parade”.
Family life in 18th century America is pictured with authenticity and charm in this enchanting animated rendition of the traditional folk lullaby. Illustrated and based on the book by Aliki.

results.title: Hush [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts and Katherine Fry
results.brief_description: Beginning and concluding at an airport, “Hush” is about a family living in a caravan park who are estranged from one another by a secret, unspoken crime that involves one of the sisters. Cast includes Hayley O’Donnell, Marieke Hardy, Saskia Post and Greg Carroll.

results.title: Hurt
results.creator_credit: Arts Northwest, BIG hART, The Omni Group, Phillip Crawford and Mathew Perry
results.brief_description: Initiated by BIG hART, a non profit organisation which pilots art projects for marginalised young people, this film allowed rural Australian youth to translate stories based on their personal experiences of familial violence onto film. Made as part of a violence prevention strategy funded by the New South Wales government it was shot on location in several central New South Wales towns where young people participated in workshops to develop narrative material for the project. As well as shaping narratives, they operated film equipment, art directed and acted in the film. While it is based on real events, the film is not a documentary, but a creative dramatisation which employs innovative editing and visual effects to convey the participants painful feelings and experiences of domestic violence and social dislocation.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Arts Northwest, BIG hART, The Omni Group, Phillip Crawford and Mathew Perry

results.title: Hurry hurry; The Great chase
results.creator_credit: Castle Films and United World Films
results.brief_description:
Two excerpts from the film ‘Never give a sucker an even break’ (1941).
‘Hurry hurry’ - W.C. Fields offers to drive a woman in a hurry to the maternity hospital. His reckless driving causes her to faint on the back seat as well as leaving a wake of utter bedlam behind him.
‘The great chase’ - W.C. Fields earns himself a job at the bank after unwittingly foiling the getaway of two bank robbers. He is then taken hostage by one of the robbers in a second robbery attempt and forced to drive the getaway car with policemen hot on their tails.

results.title: Hurricane circuit
results.brief_description: Shows how the warning centre at Miami, Florida, reduces hurrican menace in the Caribbean and the Gulf of Mexico. The operation of the warning system, precautions against damage, rescue and relief measures, and international aspects of the warning system. The nature of hurricanes is shown by animation.

results.title: Hurricane below
results.creator_credit: United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration and Screenscope
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Earth science series”.
Shows how NASA provides early weather warning data from space observations to reduce casualties and property loss from natural disasters such as hurricanes, floods and tornadoes. Includes emotional interviews with people who have lost their homes in a hurricane and shows the devastating aftermath hurricanes can cause.

results.title: Hurly burly
results.creator_credit: Carol Drive Productions, Anthony Drazan, Richard Gladstein and David Shamroy Hamburger
results.brief_description: Sean Penn won the highly coveted award for ‘Best Actor’ at the 1998 Venice Film Festival for his role as Eddie in Anthony Drazan’s “Hurly burly”. Set against the lavish backdrop of the Hollywood Hills, Eddie and his three friends justify each other’s existence of excessive drug taking and infidelity through their incessant ‘one-upping’ of each other. The women associated with this group are commodified and swapped around like trading cards to further embellish the homo-social world the male characters have created. Through powerful cinematography and drug-induced dialogue, “Hurly burly” gives an insight into a seemingly fantastical world made real. Penn leads an acclaimed ensemble of actors in David Rabe’s screen adaptation of his own stage play. Cast includes Kevin Spacey, Gary Shandling, Robin Wright Penn, Chazz Palminteri, Anna Paquin and Meg Ryan.

results.title: Huon's new harvest
results.brief_description: The construction of a wood pulping factory in southern Tasmania. How the great eucalypt forests are managed, huge logs converted to pulp pellets, and then these pellets are shipped to Sydney where strong packaging paper is manufactured for supply to fibreboard container manufacturers.
